assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Digilife Technologies Limited provides telecommunication services in Southeast Asia and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Telecom and Technology. It distributes mobile prepaid cards of telecom operators in Indonesia; and operates a distribution network of approximately 30,000 resellers, 150 dealers, and sub-dealers in Indonesia. The company also provides hardware infrastructure and business service integration for government and corporate clients; integrated ICT solutions, such as consultancy, maintenance, and disaster recovery services; undertakes projects on networking, data hosting, and managed service solutions; and cloud, IoT, server consolidation, virtualization, and other services. In addition, it supplies, rents, maintains, and services computer hardware and peripheral equipment; and provides systems integration services related to computer equipment and peripherals; storage systems and networking products; and customized solutions and software products. Further, the company offers networking and routing solutions; switches, monitors, solutions, hardware, and facilities management services; cloud computing and data, security, backup, and infrastructure services; and data services, including broadband, lease line access, private network, network security, hosted services, and information technology solutions. Additionally, it is involved in the provision of battery electric vehicles and passenger land transport services; motor vehicles dealership and retail of spare parts and accessories; renting and leasing of private cars; procurement and sale of mobile handsets and accessories, computers, and electronic equipment; repair and maintenance of mobile phones; trading of mobile handsets, portable computers, and computer accessories. The company was formerly known as SEVAK Limited and changed its name to Digilife Technologies Limited in April 2021. Digilife Technologies Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Singapore.
